doc.title: Fording the River Nile on Donkeys
doc.plot: The donkeys start down a steep bank with naked Egyptian boys on their backs. At the edge of the river the fun begins. Natives rush down the bank and try to push the stubborn brutes into the water. Donkeys fall into the water, carrying their riders with them. (Taken on the winter cruise of the S. S. "Auguste Victoria" of the Hamburg-American Line, leaving New York on 03 Feb 1903.)
